Strings.Text: {scroll 0}Jill, this house is\ndangerous.{scroll 1}{clear 124}{scroll 0}There are terrible demons,\nouch!{scroll 1}{timed 73}
{scroll 0}You're wounded! What kind of\ndemon attacked you?{scroll 1}{timed 122}
{scroll 0}It was a huge snake,\nand also poisonous... uhh{scroll 1}{timed 172}
{scroll 0}Oh no! I should have\nbrought some with me.{scroll 1}{timed 105}
{scroll 0}\nHere's the serum!{scroll 1}{clear 83}{scroll 0}Richard, hold on, I'll give\nyou a shot now.{scroll 1}{timed 83}
{scroll 0}Jill, here's my radio.\nYou should keep it. I'm...{scroll 1}{timed 200}
{scroll 2}I've got to go to get the\nserum...{scroll 10}
{scroll 2}His breathing has stopped. \nTry mouth to mouth?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}His breathing has completely\nstopped.{clear 0}{scroll 2}He will die if he doesn't\nget some oxygen soon.
